00026 const Equation_base& Pb_Dilatable_Proto::equation_impl(int i, const Equation_base& eq1, const Equation_base& eq2) const
00027 {
00028   if ( !( i==0 || i==1 ) )
00029     {
00030       Cerr << "Error in Pb_Dilatable_Proto::equation() : Wrong number of equation !" << finl;
00031       Process::exit();
00032     }
00033   return (i == 0) ? eq1 : eq2;
00034 }
00035 
00036 Equation_base& Pb_Dilatable_Proto::equation_impl(int i, Equation_base& eq1, Equation_base& eq2)
00037 {
00038   if ( !( i==0 || i==1 ) )
00039     {
00040       Cerr << "Error in Pb_Dilatable_Proto::equation() : Wrong number of equation !" << finl;
00041       Process::exit();
00042     }
00043   return (i == 0) ? eq1 : eq2;
00044 }
00045 
00046 int Pb_Dilatable_Proto::verifier_impl(const Equation_base& eq1, const Equation_base& eq2, const bool is_thermal)
00047 {
00048   const Zone_Cl_dis& zone_Cl_1 = eq1.zone_Cl_dis(), zone_Cl_2 = eq2.zone_Cl_dis();
00049   return is_thermal == true ? tester_compatibilite_hydr_thermique(zone_Cl_1,zone_Cl_2) :
00050          tester_compatibilite_hydr_fraction_massique(zone_Cl_1, zone_Cl_2);
00051 }
